name: InterventionsRelatedToAdministrationImmunizations
title: Interventions Related to Administration, Immunizations
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains education codes related to the administration of immunizations.),(Data Element Scope: Datatype: Procedure

The intent of this data element is to document procedures when an immunization was administered to a patient.),(Inclusion Criteria: Any codes that document immunization administration.),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes not related to immunization administration.)
